name: Darth Vader
description: After you perform an action, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform an action.

name: Grand Inquisitor
description: While you defend at attack range 1, you may spend 1 [Force] to prevent the range 1 bonus. While you perform an attack against a defender at attack range 2-3, you may spend 1 [Force] to apply the range 1 bonus.

name: Seventh Sister
description: While you perform a primary attack, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 2 [Force] to cancel 1 [Evade] result.

name: Fifth Brother
description: While you perform an attack, after the Neutralize Results step, if the attack hit, you may spend 2 [Force] to add 1 [Critical Hit] result.

name: Second Sister
description: While you perform an attack, after the Neutralize Results step, if the attack hit, you may spend 2 [Force]. If you do, change all of your [Hit] results to [Critical Hit] results.

name: Darth Vader
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 blank result to a [Hit] result.

name: Darth Vader
description: You cannot spend [Force] except while attacking. While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 blank result to a [Hit] result.
